Package marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager.io

Class SerialPortImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager.io.SerialPortImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jssc.SerialPortEventListener
    public class SerialPortImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements jssc.SerialPortEventListener
    Abstract manager for serial ports with listeners. Provides a simple way to connect your board, to send and to receive data and to get a list containing all the available ports. For each error, this class will use the ConnectionException class to give you a better explanation of the error (see ConnectionException.getType(), Throwable.getCause() and Throwable.getMessage()).
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    marcocipriani01
    See Also:
    jSSC on GitHub, jSSC examples - Google Code Archive
